video:video.video:title: How to Fix Gerrymandering... 10-4 Texas
video:video.video:description: Every 10 years after a census, our elected officials, in both parties, draw district lines around voters to skew elections in their favor.

video:video.video:title: Why Vote by Mail is a Good Thing... 10-4 Texas
video:video.video:description: Current restrictions on absentee voting prevent many Texans from voting. This year an unprecedented number will be affected. Voters should never be forced to choose between their right to vote and their health and the health of others.

video:video.video:title: Why the Origin of Laws Should be Transparent... 10-4 Texas
video:video.video:description: Corporations have created “Bill Factories” where they write one bill, then create copies for individual states, which legislators pass while concealing the origins and authorship from the public.

video:video.video:title: Why Texas Votes Should Be Secure and Backed Up... 10-4 Texas
video:video.video:description: Malfunctions and vulnerabilities plague our archaic voting systems, leaving Texans with no paper backup and no way to verify the accuracy and security of our vote.

video:video.video:title: How to Solve Party Polarization... 10-4 Texas
video:video.video:description: Conventional elections create party polarization and leave voters dissatisfied with their choice of candidates and 'winners' who didn't receive majority support.

video:video.video:title: How Texas Can Increase Voter Turnout... 10-4 Texas
video:video.video:description: Polling location closures, limited polling options, and restrictive polling legislation create barriers for many Texans, denying them equal access to exercise their right to vote.

video:video.video:title: Why Money Shouldn't Influence Our Laws... 10-4 Texas
video:video.video:description: Paid lobbyists influence our elected officials with campaign donations, and lucrative job offers after they leave office. In exchange, while in office, politicians pass laws that favor the special interests of lobbyists.

video:video.video:title: How Texas Should Register to Vote... 10-4 Texas
video:video.video:description: Our outdated voter registration system results in errors, inefficiencies and wasted taxpayer dollars that fuel partisan disputes over the integrity of voter rolls.

video:video.video:title: Why Texas Should Have Publicly Funded Elections... 10-4 Texas
video:video.video:description: Candidates need access to deep-pocketed donors to run for office. As a result, those who are elected typically serve those wealthy donors rather than the people they represent.

video:video.video:title: Why Texas Needs to Pay More Attention... 10-4 Texas
